description: Unique identifier for the inventory item (part number/SKU) used to reference a specific part or stock item in the fleet parts catalog.
ABC inventory classification indicating the item's importance or consumption value for stocking decisions (A=highest priority, B=moderate, C=lowest).
Code identifying the associated warehouse/site or accounting classification for the item; likely used for grouping or costing. Meaning may vary; confirm with SME.
User ID of the person who created the record.
Date and time the record was created.
